## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G28470](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G28470)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATMYB35, MYB35, TDF1</u>
- **Gene Name:** MYB DOMAIN PROTEIN 35, DEFECTIVE IN MERISTEM DEVELOPMENT AND FUNCTION 1
- **Description:**   Duplicated homeodomain-like superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:
   -  [AT3G28470.1](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT3G28470.1)

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [tdf1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Male sterile due to defects in anther development. Earliest defect seen at developmental stage 6. Tapetal cells do not develop into secretory tapetal cells. Excessive tapetal cell division.Microspores also developmentally defective.
